Augment.Name: Deconstructor
Augment.Description: Weapon gains DR bypass "Adamantine" and Armor Destruction and 6d6 Rust damage versus constructs.

Augment.Name: Draconic Soul Gem
Augment.Description: This gem pulses with the stolen lifeforce of several slain dragons. +30 Enhancement bonus to Acid, Cold, Electric and Fire resistance

Augment.Name: Golem's Heart
Augment.Description: 2% chance on your being hit to heal you for 20 to 120 Hit Points and deal 50 to 300 Electric damage to your surrounding enemies.

Augment.Name: Meridian Fragment
Augment.Description: -6 SP Cost to Maximized spells. Once every three seconds when you take physical damage you get Psionic Potency +8. This can stack up to three times (up to Psionic Potency +24) and each stack lasts for 20 seconds.

Augment.Name: Ruby of Ghostbane
Augment.Description: Ghost Touch 1 to 6 Bane damage on hit vs Undead

Augment.Name: Ruby of the Crushing Wave
Augment.Description: Adds crushing wave to your weapon attacks

Augment.Name: Ruby of the Endless Night
Augment.Description: Your weapon now inflicts a Negative Level on a vorpal hit

Augment.Name: Ruby of the Vampire Slayer
Augment.Description: Your weapon gains DR Silver and does 1 to 4 light damage

Augment.Name: Sapphire of Crushing Wave Guard
Augment.Description: the item gains Crushing Wave Guard

Augment.Name: The Master's Gift
Augment.Description: +5% Enhancement bonus to all earned Experience Points

Augment.Name: Topaz of Anthem
Augment.Description: You regenerate bard songs over time

Augment.Description: You deal an extra 2d6 acid damage on attacks

Augment.Name: +2d6 Sonic Damage
Augment.Description: You deal an extra 2d6 sonic damage on attacks
